title: @Riot, I'm no mathematician but if there's 0 days left, then shouldn't Act III be up?
body: Or is is more like 0 Days, 6 Hours? Because I know everything is dictated by the NA Server Time Zone.

replies.body: It's still not unlocked yet... I swear that it's been sitting on 0 days for over 24 hours now. ;-;

~~Which means it will be live at 5/6pm AEST tonight depending on whether they're on daylight savings at the moment.~~

It _should_ come live at 5pm AEST (Midnight PDT).

NA time. 

It's the price we pay for living in the future.
Yeah, but the real question is what time in NA do these events start? Evidently not at 12.01am PDT or 6am PDT. I'm fairly sure it came out at like 5am here which is about midday PDT.
calm your shit, the community is way worse
don't go all ham on rito
I wouldn't even mind if it also had Hours & Minutes in the countdown.
I bet this shit unlocks at an ungodly hour when most people are sleeping >_>, makes sense right!!!
